name: Roll20 - Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for Roll20.net. I noticed a lot of the existing templates are broken in some way, so I created a version that works with the site as of December 2016.
additional_info: If you encounter any issues, please let me know and I'll take a look. The CSS is a bit of a mess and I do plan to clean it up with comment code so people can tweak it as they see fit.

discussions.name: The best roll20 theme available, but the macro font color could be made more readable.
Great Theme - Just one issue. Checkboxes are nearly invisible (Fixed)
